platillos.name: Sopa de zanahoria y papa
platillos.description: Rich legume soup with tomato broth

instructions.part-twp: Blend half onion with 3 tomatoes and fry it with 1 spoon of cooking oil. Season to taste.
instructions.part-three: Add water to the tomatoe/onion paste. Add vegetables.
instructions.part-four: Boil for five minutes and low the flame to medium and cook until vegetable are coock

instructions.part-twp: Version two: Toast each ingredient and smaash each one adding to the mix one by one
instructions.part-three: The order fo the smash mix: garlic, salt, pepper, coriander, onions, tomatoes.
